channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: This year's Razer Blade 14 gaming laptop with an RTX 5060 is on sale for its lowest price ever
item.description: Yes, it's the 2025 model with the RTX 5060 and Ryzen 9

item.title: Oura Ring 4 Ceramic review: a colorful glow up
item.description: If you want a pop of color and style, then the Oura Ring 4 Ceramic might be the smart ring for you.

item.title: DOJ Issued Seizure Warrant to Starlink Over Satellite Internet Systems Used at Scam Compound
item.description: A new US law enforcement initiative is aimed at crypto fraudsters targeting Americans—and now seeks to seize infrastructure it claims is crucial to notorious scam compounds.

item.title: How Do You Run a Klingon Empire?
item.description: The history of the Federation's rise is one of the most documented parts of 'Star Trek'—but the history of its longtime rival is wrapped in mystery.

item.title: IBM goes all-in on quantum chips - new Nighthawk and Loon hardware look to bring the dream to life at last
item.description: IBM unveils “Nighthawk” and “Loon” quantum chips, marking major progress toward practical, fault-tolerant computing and verified quantum advantage.

item.title: Palantir’s CEO Disavows Surveillance Concerns, Thinks ‘Patriotism Will Make You Rich’
item.description: You can't keep a good Karp down.

item.title: Black Friday 2025: Expert Tips for Finding the Best Deals
item.description: The biggest retail event of the year has grown into an entire month of sales that ebb and flow. Here’s how to make the most of it.

item.title: Chinese Beverage Chains Spread Across the US, Challenging Starbucks' Dominance
item.description: Luckin Coffee, Chagee, and other Chinese brands are targeting US consumers with Instagram-worthy drinks sold through sleek mobile apps.

item.title: A recent Switch 2 update blocks some third-party docks, but Nintendo isn’t saying why
item.description: Nintendo recently issued an update (21.0.0) for its Switch 2 console that, in addition to some small changes, has caused some third-party docks to stop working as intended. In the early weeks and months of the console’s availability this summer, companies raced to figure out the right commands, the right power draw, and the right […]

item.title: Apple AirPods 4 are down to their lowest-ever price in this early Black Friday deal
item.description: This is the cheapest these AirPods 4 have ever been on Amazon

item.title: If hackers can use AI to automate massive cyber attacks, Terminator robots are the least of our problems
item.description: Anthropic's recent dissection of a massive AI-powered cyber attack should scare the heck out of all of us

item.title: 30 Best Early Black Friday Deals on WIRED-Tested Gear (2025)
item.description: We found early Black Friday deals on WIRED-tested smart bird feeders, smartwatches, vacuums, and more.

item.title: First Central Bank in Europe Buys Bitcoin Months After ECB President Said It Would Never Enter Reserves
item.description: Never say never.

item.title: Paramount Skydance is working on a new Star Trek movie
item.description: Paramount Skydance head David Ellison made it very clear that he was interested in restarting the studio’s Star Trek movie franchise with some new blood, and it seems like that plan is moving forward. Deadline reports that Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves co-directors Jonathan Goldstein and John Francis Daley have signed on to an […]

item.title: Stephen King Stands by That Controversial New ‘Running Man’ Ending
item.description: The legendary author talks about changes in the new Edgar Wright film starring Glen Powell.

item.title: Guess who’s back? Kaspersky launches new Linux antivirus for $59.99
item.description: Banned in the US, antivirus manufacturer Kaspersky has launched a new line of Linux antivirus packages.

item.title: Le gouvernement veut bloquer l’accès à Shein dans les 48 heures
item.description: Shein est de nouveau dans le viseur de l’exécutif. Après une série de découvertes jugées « gravement illicites » dans ses rayons, le gouvernement réclame le blocage express du site en France. L’éditeur irlandais de la plateforme comme les principaux FAI sont sommés d’agir sous 48 heures, sur fond d’enquêtes élargies à d’autres géants du e-commerce.

item.title: Trump Kills Plan to Compensate Travelers With Cash for Delayed Flights
item.description: Great timing.

item.title: Peacock has canceled Poker Face after two seasons - but Rian Johnson wants a Game of Thrones star to help him revive it
item.description: Poker Face has been canceled by Peacock, but creator Rian Johnson has plans to revive it with a new star in the lead role.

item.title: Les astronomes tombent sur une surprise : notre Système solaire se déplacerait presque 4 fois plus vite qu’on ne le pensait !
item.description: Comprendre les déplacements de notre Système solaire au sein de la Voie lactée est particulièrement complexe. Désormais, de nouvelles observations semblent montrer une trajectoire… Mais elles contredisent énormément les simulations sur le sujet.

item.title: Test du Realme P3 5G : le champion du gaming à moins de 200 euros
item.description: Avec son P3 5G, Realme propose un smartphone d'entrée de gamme à moins de 250 euros qui concentre ses efforts sur la performance et l'autonomie.

item.title: Anthropic says an AI may have just attempted the first truly autonomous cyberattack
item.description: The company has upgraded its detection tools after uncovering thousands of automated requests per second—far beyond anything human hackers could produce. In a new report, AI company Anthropic detailed a “highly sophisticated espionage campaign” that deployed its artificial intelligence tools to launch automated cyberattacks around the globe.

item.title: A Brand New ‘Star Trek’ Movie Is Coming From the Team Behind ‘Dungeons & Dragons’
item.description: Jonathan Goldstein and John Francis Daley have been hired to make a whole new 'Star Trek' film.

item.title: Our Favorite Webcam Is Marked Down by $35
item.description: Save a chunk of change on Logitech's high-end USB webcam.

item.title: No, that AI country song isnt No. 1 on the Billboard chart. Yes, it is terrible.
item.description: Did you hear that an AI country song hit the top of the Billboard country charts? Well, you can't believe everything you hear.
